text: talaaq do baar hai. phir saamaany niyam ke anusaar (stree ko) rok liya jae ya bhale tareeqe se vida kar diya jae. aur tumhaare lie vaidh nahin hai ki jo kuchh tum unhen de chuke ho, usamen se kuchh le lo, sivaay is sthiti ke ki donon ko dar ho ki allaah kee (nirdhaarit) seemaon par qaayam na rah sakenge to yadi tumako yah dar ho ki ve allaah kee seemao par qaayam na rahenge to stree jo kuchh dekar chhutakaara praapt karana chaahe usamen un dono ke lie koee gunaah nahin. ye allaah kee seemaen hai. atah inaka ullanghan na karo. aur jo koee allaah kee seemaon ka ullanghan kare to aise log atyaachaaree hai
